title: Fax Machine

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may send a Fax to any player with a message of up to 150 words. They are informed it was sent from a Fax Machine.
- At night, players with a Fax can forward it to another player. The Fax appears identical to a system message and they are not told where it came from. They cannot forward the Fax.
- On night three you can attack one player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are not aware of who has a Fax or which player Forwarded one.
- When a player forwards their Fax, you gain the ability to attack one player the next night.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: See four players holding a Fax die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4328
*After decades of being smacked and talked down to, the fax machine had enough. It's like the terminator but cooler.*
